taskDefinition.name: Kinetic Request CE Attributes Set
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Updates one or more Attributes in Kinetic Request CE for the specified object.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Type
parameter.tooltip: What type of attribute should be set.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Required for Category or Form. The slug of the kapp where the attributes will be set.

parameter.label: Type Identifier
parameter.tooltip: The identifier that will be used to identify what type to update. A username, name, or slug. Leave blank to update all objects for the type that are found.

parameter.label: Attributes
parameter.tooltip: A JSON array of the attributes to update / create. Ex. [{'name': 'Attribute Name','values': ['Attr Value 1']}]

parameter.label: Create New Attribute
parameter.tooltip: If the attribute doesn't exist on the object, create it. Default to false (only objects that currently have this attribute will be set.
